fgu.avoidance 0.1.0

Reference

Loading

load_data()

Load data from a particular filepath

load_folder()

Loads all files from a folder and combines to a large table which is then processed

Preprocessing

Functions which restructure and prepare objects for future analysis or visualisaiton

combine_all()

Creates a single navr object with all animals combined together

add_areas(<avoidance.single>)

Adds areas into the positioning data

add_areas(<avoidance.multiple>)

Adds areas of interest into the positioning data.

smooth_speed(<avoidance.single>)

Smooths speeds

smooth_positions(<avoidance.single>)

Smooths positioning data

getters

Function allowing access to some hidden

get_position_table()

Returns positioning data

filter_animals()

Filter the fgu.avoidance object for chosen animals

Analysis

Functions analysing animal behaviour

session_results()

Basic results to give a report from a single session

create_crosses_vector()

Creates a vector of length exp_length which contains number of crosses given area presence

collect_area_presence()

Returns times of animal presence in each area of interest

collect_crosses()

Collects information about each cross in given object

collect_freezes()

Searches for episodes of freezing behaviour

Visualisations

plot_area_presence()

Plots an image of area presence for avoidance.single

plot_crosses()

Plots paths for crossings

plot_path(<avoidance.single>)

Creates a path graph of a single trial

plot_speed(<avoidance.single>)

Plots animal's speed

create_heatmap()

Creates heatmap from passed object

gradient_style()

Styling functions for the heatmap and paths

  • Preprocessing
